title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: The service combined video, text and graphics with the screen divided into 4 parts: a video section displaying highlights and news bulletins, a breaking news ticker at the bottom and a scoring section for in-depth analysis of results and game stats. Eurosport EPL Romania was a channel owned by Eurosport, which broadcast the English Premier League in Romania.

title: Discovery takes full ownership of Eurosport | Reuters
snippet: Discovery Communications Inc said on Wednesday it would take full ownership of sports broadcaster Eurosport for 491 million euros ($534 million) from French media group TF1 Group.

title: Eurosport
snippet: The rebrand follows Discovery’s acquisition of Eurosport which after it bought a majority stake in the sports destination in May 2014 and was completed in a €491m deal in October 2015.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery - Discovery Communications Agrees to Take Full Control of Eurosport
snippet: (Silver Spring, Md.) – Discovery Communications (Nasdaq: DISCA, DISCB, DISCK) today announced an agreement to acquire full ownership of Eurosport, the leading sports channels group across Europe and Asia, for €491 million from TF1 Group, which has announced it will exercise a put option ...
